item.title: XMPP Auto Reply Bot
item.description: This an introduction to a simple Perl script that replies to your XMPP buddies based on key words. This is not really a great script in terms of use, but could be fun. This is not same as auto-reply in Pidgin. This script replies to your buddies, may be you can run it while you are away. There are few key words like ‘hi’, ‘hello’, ‘hey’, ‘why’, ‘where’, ‘what’ etc. You can add few more you like.
